nodes.text: Voodoo was a ritual practice of the Sayormi in the Dead Forest on Kashyyyk, used to curse their enemies, including the Wookiees of the Kerritamba Village. These rituals involved the use of voodoo dolls. Voodoo was also used by the Witches of Dathomir, a cult of Force-sensitive witches from Dathomir, and used by Talzin to torture Count Dooku into stopping the invasion.
